titlepage.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlepage.author: Mariah Levitt
titlepage.sponsor: Encoding funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: Contains correspondence, memorabilia, newspaper clippings, press releases and photographs about distinguished visitors to Smith College.

bioghist.p: The materials in this collection have been accumulated over the years from various sources in and outside the College.

scopecontent.p: The distinguished visitors files contain correspondence, memorabilia, newspaper clippings, press releases and photographs documenting the visits of distinguished persons to Smith College since its founding in 1871. The material ranges in date from 1848 to the present, with the bulk of the collection falling between 1888 and the present.

arrangement.p: The files are arranged alphabetically by the last name of the visitor.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the files must be requested from the College Archives. The Archives has no information on the status of literary rights in the collection and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College Distinguished Visitors Files, Box #, Smith College Archives.

accruals.head: Additions to the Collection
accruals.p: Additions to these records arrive in the College Archives on a regular basis. Please contact the College Archives for the most up-to-date information.

acqinfo.p: The materials in this collection have been accumulated over the years from various sources in and outside of the College.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional materials may also be found in the faculty biographical files, alumnae biographical files and published materials located in the Smith College Archives.

note.p: See: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
